H6860.def: = town, precise location unknown; ◄ territory of {L:Simeon<SDBH:שִׁמְעֹון>}; ► belonged to {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>} and given to {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} before he moved to {L:Hebron<SDBH:חֶבְרֹון>} where he was made king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H7812.def: = to lay oneself down on the ground ► as a sign of submission

H5594.def: = action by which human perform the mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include {L:wailing<SDBH:ילל>}, tearing one's clothes, putting on {L:sackcloth<SDBH:שַׂק>}, covering oneself with dust or ashes, {L:fasting<SDBH:צום>} or eating specific food, {L:cutting oneself<SDBH:גדד>}, {L:shaving one's head<SDBH:קרח>}, covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event

H1058.def: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

H6684.def: = action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H6153.def: = the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H2491.def: = state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H1661.def: = basin ◄ hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster ► into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a {L:trough or vat<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}; ≈ treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment

H1319.def: = action by which humans pass on information to someone else, having been commissioned to do so by a deity or another person

H2351.def: = referent to the location outside of an object

H831.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the five cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H8055.def: = state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy

H2919.def: = condensed moisture resulting from contact of air and cooler land surfaces; ►an important source of water for vegetation; ≈ regarded as refreshing, life-enhancing; associated with fertility

H4306.def: = water coming down from the sky, which is indispensable for sustaining human life, but can be both refreshing and destructive

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H4043.def: = a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H1602.def: = state in which humans or deities are deeply revulsed by other humans or deities, as if they are dirty

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1097.def: = particle marking a proposition as not true

H4899.def: = a (non-eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H2491.def: = state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object

H2459.def: = fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H7198.def: = a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

H3083.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Gersom<SDBH:גֵּרְשֹׁום>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► Levite assisting {L:Micah<SDBH:מִיכָיְהוּ>} and later the {L:Danites<SDBH:דָּנִי>} as {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H268.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3083.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Gersom<SDBH:גֵּרְשֹׁום>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► Levite assisting {L:Micah<SDBH:מִיכָיְהוּ>} and later the {L:Danites<SDBH:דָּנִי>} as {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H5273.def: = state in which a person or object has qualities that inspire love and appreciation

H6504.def: = process by which an object is split up into smaller units

H4194.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living

H7043.def: = state in which animals and objects have the ability to move or act with speed ◄ due to lack of weight, agility, strength, training, or energy

H5404.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = a grouping of large birds of prey with keen eyesight; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ associated with large size and great strength, ability to fly great distances at high speed; symbol of protection, metaphor for God, but also symbol for death in battle

H1396.def: = process by which humans gain strength, power, and authority, which enables them to do things that others are unable to accomplish

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H1058.def: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3847.def: = state in which humans wear certain clothes, often for a specific purpose

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H3830.def: = generic designation for any article of clothing

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

14.gl: to provide (someone) with clothes (to put on)

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H5276.def: = state in which a person or object has qualities that inspire love and appreciation

H160.def: = affection between people, or between people and deities

H6381.def: = state in which an event is out of the ordinary, inspiring amazement, and usually associated with the supernatural

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be
